segments.text: I see the woman with her back turned, completely focused on her mundane task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills out steadily, and I can’t help but feel a twinge of panic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s an ongoing disaster waiting to happen right at her feet, yet she remains oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, however, are fully aware of what they’re doing; it’s like they’re in on a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's excitement as he reaches for the cookies brings a smile to my face despite my worries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart races as I watch him wobble on that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why does he think this is a safe idea? It just seems so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her eager outstretched hand, reminds me of how fun stealing cookies can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel disgusted by how easily they break the house rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquil garden outside contrasts sharply with the brewing chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
